html:
Burning plains and hills
An angel on his watch
A deserter on the run
Diamonds shining
Canes waving on wind
Ponds singing loud
A stork taking care
Of their offspring
An ambulance speeding
Theyâ€™re applying fentanyl
An hourglass measures time
A bear is roaring dangerously
On polygons training
Combat against the enemy
A nuclear reactor glowing
Someone getting rich
title: Rich
